meanings.definition: The act of covering with a thin layer of gold.
meanings.sent1: The gildings on the statue shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate gildings on the antique mirror.
meanings.sent3: The gildings on the cake made it look like a royal dessert.
meanings.sent4: His words were like gildings, adding a touch of elegance to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The gildings on the crown sparkled like tiny stars.

meanings.definition: Objects that have been covered with a thin layer of gold.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient gildings from different civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry store showcased beautiful gildings in the window.
meanings.sent3: The gildings on the tableware made dinner feel like a fancy event.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as the gildings on her necklace.
meanings.sent5: The gildings on the frame added a touch of luxury to the painting.
